pageContext.title: Monster
pageContext.description: Your looks, reputation, or nature cause common folk to fear or reject you.

front.name: Monster
front.desc: Your looks, reputation, or nature cause common folk to fear or reject you.
prompts: Use others' fears to your advantage
Exploit the source of your monstrousness
Make common cause with other monsters

back.name: Monster
back.desc: To be the thing they say you are. How easy to do it accidentally. How tempting to choose it.
prompts: Make everything worse for yourself or an ally
back.rule: Flip when a prompt is narrated by anyone.
